Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed across all process variants
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants in which SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Reviewer Agreed is immediately followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events per case (manuscript)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that are not followed by another SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case (i.e., unique agreement per reviewer)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed relative to the number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers events
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears more than once, indicating multiple reviewers agreeing
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed activities occurring in the first half of the process lifecycle versus the second half
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in comparison to RW-Reviewer Agreed (round-wise counterpart)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed occurrences that lead to a final decision (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Major Revision, SW-EIC Minor Revision, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed activities that occur after at least one Reviewer Invitation Reminder (Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that ultimately result in manuscript acceptance (e.g., ending with SW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed occurrences that happen after SW-Reviewer Selection is now due or any late-selection alert activity
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events that directly precede a revision outcome (e.g., SW-EIC Major Revision or SW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur without any prior SW-Reviewer Declined or SW-Reviewer No Response in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed events that are part of the shortest and most frequent variant paths leading to editorial decisions
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed out of all reviewer-related activities (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response, SW-Reviewer Unavailable)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', 'SW-Reviewer No Response', 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable']"}"

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed among all activities occurring during the reviewer assignment phase (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, SW-Initial Reviewer Selection, SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week, etc.)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-AE Assign Reviewers', 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week', 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1', 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late', 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late']"}"
